hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Blue Poe Room Pot 1

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #the Boomerang# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: I am @, hero of the Gossip Stones! Hear my name and tremble!

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #0# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #gold#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Compass#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
